welcome.title: Join us at LOS!
welcome.text: Nice to see you here. Without people like you, our work would not be possible. Become a member or volunteer now.

combo.optin.title: Interested in a combined membership?
combo.optin.text: You can become a member at LOS and another queer organisation and receive a little discount.

cta.title: Become a volunteer!
cta.text: Would you like to support us with your skills, interests or talents? Sign in here and we will contact you when we need your help.

thanks.text: We are very happy you are becoming a part of LOS. We will contact you soon.
